description: I remember writing my thesis in organic chemistry for undergrad how difficult it was to use placeholders for all of my numbered compounds and references. It would be great to build a program that could automate the naming and references for papers.
Set up a reminder system with individualized reminders about what chores are due in advance.
It would be nice to have job alerts for specific organizations you are following. Could look generally at something like Linkedin/Indeed, or pull data from specific org websites.
